about_the_game:
Prepare for a thrilling, nostalgic adventure with "Ninja Gold Thief," a modern homage to classic arcade escape runner games. In this charming and fast-paced game, you control a blue, adorable ninja on a quest for gold. Your mission? Steal precious gold from other ninjas while evading capture in 34 increasingly challenging levels.
Navigate intricate mazes, dodge cunning adversaries, and outwit your opponents with quick reflexes and clever strategies. Each level intensifies the difficulty, pushing your skills to the limit as you face the same obstacles with heightened challenges. Can you outsmart the rival ninjas and collect all the gold?
With its retro-inspired gameplay, vibrant graphics, and escalating difficulty, "Ninja Gold Thief" offers hours of engaging fun for players of all ages. Get ready to sneak, steal, and score in this epic ninja heist!

The game uses Steam Leaderboards to save player scores, which can be viewed in the game community. The high score displayed in the game is the top score from that leaderboard. Try to beat it with your own high score!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or AMD/Nvidia equivalent for Mac
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
